title: House of Pleasure
description: When her father does, Trudi Styles is left alone in the murky back streets of Liverpool. Miserable and discontent, her life turns around when she goes to work at a large mansion. Her duties go beyond the normal ones expected of a maid, and despite her growing fondness for her new friends and creature comforts, something sinister lies at the heart of the house.  This is an erotic fiction which depicts strongly sexual content (hardcore). Please do not read if easily offended.
author: Trudi Styles
